channel.title: Storage on Arrans github.io

item.title: juicedata/juicefs
item.description: JuiceFS is a distributed POSIX file system built on top of Redis and S3.

item.title: spacedriveapp/spacedrive
item.description: Spacedrive is an open source cross-platform file explorer, powered by a virtual distributed filesystem written in Rust.

item.title: kurrier-org/kurrier
item.description: Kurrier is a modern, self-hosted workspace for email, calendar, contacts and storage.

item.title: okhosting/awesome-storage
item.description: A curated list of storage open source tools. Backups, redundancy, sharing, distribution, encryption, etc.

item.title: objectbox/objectbox-go
item.description: Embedded Go Database, the fast alternative to SQLite, gorm, etc.

item.title: lotusdblabs/lotusdb
item.description: Most advanced key-value database written in Go, extremely fast, compatible with LSM tree and B+ tree.

item.title: hack-pad/hackpadfs
item.description: An extensible file system abstraction for Go. File systems, composable interfaces, and test suites.
